Protocols/SessionRefreshDelegate.html#/c.name: -loginSessionRefreshSucceed
Protocols/SessionRefreshDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Called when user’s login session has been refreshed successfully.

Protocols/SessionRefreshDelegate.html#/c.name: -loginSessionRefreshFailedWithError:
Protocols/SessionRefreshDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Called when failed to refresh login session.

Protocols/SessionRefreshDelegate.html#/c.name: -loginSessionRefreshFailedAndLoggedout
Protocols/SessionRefreshDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Called when failed to refresh login session because user’s current session was invalidated by the backend. User needs to login again to continue in such cases.

Protocols/UserDetailsDelegate.html#/c:ob.name: -didUpdateSuccess
Protocols/UserDetailsDelegate.html#/c:ob.abstract: Called when user’s profile information has been updated successfully in backend. Typically called in response to update marketing opt-in, replace consumer interests, update DOB and gender, update mobile number and add recovery email requests.

Protocols/UserDetailsDelegate.html#/c:ob.name: -didUpdateFailedWithError:
Protocols/UserDetailsDelegate.html#/c:ob.abstract: Called when failed to update user profile info in backend. Typically called in response to update marketing opt-in, replace consumer interests, update DOB and gender, update mobile number and add recovery email requests.

Protocols/UserDetailsDelegate.html#/c:ob.name: -didUserInfoFetchingSuccessWithUser:
Protocols/UserDetailsDelegate.html#/c:ob.abstract: Called when latest user profile was fetched successfully from backend.

Protocols/UserDetailsDelegate.html#/c:ob.name: -didUserInfoFetchingFailedWithError:
Protocols/UserDetailsDelegate.html#/c:ob.abstract: Called when failed to fetch latest user profile from backend.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didLoginWithSuccessWithUser:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when user has been authenticated successfully.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didLoginFailedwithError:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when user’s authentication with backend has failed.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didSocialRegistrationReachedSecoundStepWithUser:withProvide:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when user has been authenticated with social provider and user profile has been received from social provider. Typically used to add any more info to registration for e.g. marketing opt-in etc. before account is created in Janrain.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didAuthenticationCompleteForLogin:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when user has succesfully authenticated with social provider or user account has been merged successfully.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -socialLoginCannotLaunch:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when social login cannot be launched.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -socialAuthenticationCanceled
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when user has cancelled the social login.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -socialAuthenticationDidFailedWithError:withProvider:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when social authentication has failed. Typically when user has denied the permission.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didRegisterSuccessWithUser:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when user has been registered successfully either via traditional or social method.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didRegisterFailedwithError:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when user registration has failed.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didSendForgotPasswordSuccess
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when an email to reset password was sent successfully.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didSendForgotPasswordFailedwithError:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when failed to send email to reset password.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didResendEmailverificationSuccess
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when an email was resent with a link for account verification.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didResendEmailverificationFailedwithError:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when failed to resend account verification email.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didResendMobileverificationSuccess
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when account OTP verification code has been resent successfully to user’s mobile number.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didResendMobileverificationFailedwithError:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when failed to resend OTP verification code for account verification.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didVerificationForMobileSuccess
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when user account was verified successfully via SMS OTP.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didVerificationForMobileFailedwithError:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when user account could not be verfied for the entered SMS OTP.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didVerificationForMobileToResetPasswordSuccessWithToken:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when an SMS OTP was successfully sent to user’s mobile number and a resepective reset token was generated for password reset.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didVerificationForMobileToResetPasswordFailedwithError:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when an SMS OTP could not be sent to user’s mobile number for password reset.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didHandleMergingSuccess
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when user accounts have been merged successfully.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -didFailHandleMerging:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when merging user accounts has failed.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -logoutDidSucceed
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when user was successfully logged out and all their data was purged from device.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -logoutFailedWithError:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when logout has failed.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.name: -handleAccountSocailMergeWithExistingAccountProvider:provider:
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html#.abstract: Called when user is trying to login with one provider while user’s account already exists with different provider. In such case, user need to merge the accounts to be able to login with both providers or go back to provider with which the account was originally created.

Protocols/JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate.ht.name: -didFailToDownloadJanrainFlow:
Protocols/JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate.ht.abstract: Called when failed to download URLs, configurations and flow data from janrain server.

Protocols/JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate.ht.name: -didFinishDownloadingJanrainFlow
Protocols/JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate.ht.abstract: Called when URLs, configurations and flow data has been downloaded successfully.

Protocols/DIRegistrationConfigurationDel.name: -launchTermsAndConditions
Protocols/DIRegistrationConfigurationDel.abstract: Called when user taps on Terms & conditions link on registration screen. App should display terms and conditions in this method.

Protocols/DIRegistrationConfigurationDel.name: -launchPrivacyPolicy
Protocols/DIRegistrationConfigurationDel.abstract: Called when user taps on Privacy policy link on registration screen. App should display privacy policy in this method.

Protocols/DIRegistrationConfigurationDel.name: DIRegistrationConfigurationDelegate
Protocols/DIRegistrationConfigurationDel.abstract: Implement this protocol to receive callbacks and display appropriate content when user’s tap on TnC or PrivacyPolicy inside PhilipsRegistration.

Protocols/JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate.ht.name: JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate
Protocols/JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate.ht.abstract: Implement this protocol to be informed about success or failure of PhilipsRegistration URLs, configurations and flow download.

Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html.name: UserRegistrationDelegate
Protocols/UserRegistrationDelegate.html.abstract: Use this delegate to receive callbacks about user registration, login, forgot passowrd, resend verfication, account merging and logout events.

Protocols/UserDetailsDelegate.html.name: UserDetailsDelegate
Protocols/UserDetailsDelegate.html.abstract: Implement this protocol to receive callbacks about fetching and updation to user details.

Protocols/SessionRefreshDelegate.html.name: SessionRefreshDelegate
Protocols/SessionRefreshDelegate.html.abstract: Implement this protocol to receive callbacks about user session refresh.

Enums/DICOPPASTATUS.html#/c:@E@DICOPPAST.name: kDICOPPAConsentPending
Enums/DICOPPASTATUS.html#/c:@E@DICOPPAST.abstract: User has not provided any response for the consent probably because consent is yet to be displayed.

Enums/DICOPPASTATUS.html#/c:@E@DICOPPAST.name: kDICOPPAConfirmationPending
Enums/DICOPPASTATUS.html#/c:@E@DICOPPAST.abstract: User has not provided any response for the consent confirmation probably because confirmation is yet to be displayed.

Enums/DICOPPASTATUS.html.name: DICOPPASTATUS
Enums/DICOPPASTATUS.html.abstract: An enum that represents different states of a COPPA consent.

Enums/URPriorityFunction.html.name: URPriorityFunction
Enums/URPriorityFunction.html.abstract: An enum that defines different priority functions that can be used to inform PhilipsRegistration which function is more likely to be opted by user and help organize UI in that fashion.

Enums/URReceiveMarketingFlow.html.name: URReceiveMarketingFlow
Enums/URReceiveMarketingFlow.html.abstract: An enum that allows applications to choose from different ways in which PhilipsRegistration can display Marketing Opt-In content to users.

Enums/URLoggedInScreen.html.name: URLoggedInScreen
Enums/URLoggedInScreen.html.abstract: An enum that allows applications to display either the Martketing Optin screen or My Details screen when the user is logged in.

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: priorityFunction
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: Set this variable if the app need Create button on top or bottom in Registration Welcome page. Default is Create on top.

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: receiveMarketingFlow
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: Set the property will override the A/B Testing flow.

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: loggedInScreen
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: LoggedInScreen will tell whether the Marketing Optin or My Details screen is to be displayed.

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: animateExit
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: Allows applications to set if UR should do pop animation when exiting from UR. Default value is true.

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: isTermsAndConditionsAcceptanceRequired
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: Get if terms and conditions are required to be accepted. Default value is false.(Optional)

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: minimumAgeLimit
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: Get minimum age limit to be allowed for the user to register.(Optional)

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: signInProviders
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: Set the list of sign-in providers to be displayed for the current locale.

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: hideCountrySelection
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: Get this variable if the app need to use Country Selection with in app. Default value is NO.

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: loginPageURL
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: URL to be used for email verification landing page. Will be downloaded from ServiceDiscovery.

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: resetPasswordURL
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: URL to be used for reset password landing page. Will be downloaded from ServiceDiscovery.

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: enableSkipRegistration
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: Set the value to enable users to be able to skip registration. Default is False. To be displayed at screen UR-1.(Please refer to the flow document for more info)

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: enableLastName
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: Set the value to enable users to add their last name. Default is False. To be displayed at Create account screen.(Please refer to the flow document for more info)

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: -loadCountrySpecificConfigurationsForCountryCode:serviceURLs:
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: Loads contry specific configurations upon country change.

Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.name: valueForRegistrationTitle
Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.abstract: Set the title of ‘why the user needs to register’. To be displayed at screen UR-1.(Please refer to the flow document for more info)

Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.name: valueForRegistrationDescription
Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.abstract: Set the description of ‘why the user needs to register’. To be displayed at screen UR-1.(Please refer to the flow document for more info)

Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.name: valueForEmailVerification
Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.abstract: Set the description why the user needs to verify the account. To be displayed at screen UR-2c.(Please refer to the flow document for more info)

Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.name: optInTitleText
Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.abstract: Set the title of the Opt-In Screen

Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.name: optInQuessionaryText
Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.abstract: Set the quessionary text of the Opt-In Screen

Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.name: optInDetailDescription
Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.abstract: Set the description text of the Opt-In Screen

Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.name: optInBannerText
Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.abstract: Set the banner text of the Opt-In Screen

Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.name: optInBarTitleText
Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.abstract: Set the Navigation Bar title of the Opt-In Screen

Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.name: optinImage
Classes/DIRegistrationContentConfigurati.abstract: Set the image of the opt-In screen

Classes/URLaunchInput.html#/c:objc(cs)UR.name: delegate
Classes/URLaunchInput.html#/c:objc(cs)UR.abstract: Set this delegate to handle callbacks for TnC and Privacy policy defined above.

Classes/URLaunchInput.html#/c:objc(cs)UR.name: registrationFlowConfiguration
Classes/URLaunchInput.html#/c:objc(cs)UR.abstract: Use the attributes of this property to inform PhilipsRegistration which flow to display.

Classes/URLaunchInput.html#/c:objc(cs)UR.name: registrationContentConfiguration
Classes/URLaunchInput.html#/c:objc(cs)UR.abstract: Use the attributes of this property to inform PhilipsRegistration what content to display.

Classes/URInterface.html#/c:objc(cs)URIn.name: -userDataInterface
Classes/URInterface.html#/c:objc(cs)URIn.abstract: This interface shall include APIs to share user data.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: locale
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: email
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: Email id of logged in User.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: mobileNumber
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: Mobile number of logged in user. Mobile number is only supported for China.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: userIdentifier
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: Identifier of the user. Returns either Mobile number or email whichever is present. Mobile number is returned if both are present.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: givenName
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: Given/First name of logged in user.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: familyName
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: Surname/FamilyName of logged in user.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: isOlderThanAgeLimit
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: isOlderThanAgeLimit indicates if logged in user has accepted to be older than minimum age limit required by application.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: receiveMarketingEmails
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: receiveMarketingEmails indicates if logged in user has opted to receive marketing emails.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: marketingConsentTimestamp
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: marketingConsentTimestamp indicates the timestamp when the user has opted to receive marketing emails.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: isEmailVerified
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: isEmailVerified indicates if current user’s email is verified. User (non-China) is not completely logged in if their email is not verified.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: isMobileNumberVerified
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: isMobileNumberVerified indicates if current user’s mobile number is verified via OTP. Only applicable for China users. User is not completely logged in if mobile number is not verified.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: isVerified
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: isVerified indicates if user’s account is verified either via email or mobile number. Mobile number verification is applicable only to China users.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: consumerInterests
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: consumerInterests returns consumer interests stored in backend by applications.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: consents
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: consents returns all the user consents stored in Janrain Backend. Currently applicable only for COPPA Consents.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: country
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: country returns selected country of user which was stored under primaryAddress of user during account creation.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: language
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: prefreredLanguge returns language selected during account creation.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: isLoggedIn
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: isLoggedIn indicates user’s login state. This is one and only source of truth to know if user is actually logged in. Because user fields and state are share among components and application, it is encouraged to check user’s login state before reading/updating any user fields.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: userLoggedInState
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: userLoggedInState indicates user’s state while logging in. Based on the states, it is decided what actions need to be taken and whether user is logged in or not.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: gender
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: gender of currently logged in user. UserGenderNone is returned if user is not logged in or no information on gender can be found.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.name: birthday
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(py.abstract: birthday of currently logged in user.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -addUserRegistrationListener:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Adds a listener to get callbacks for user authentication and janrain flow download call backs. Adding a listener more than once will not have any effect.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -addUserDetailsListener:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Adds a listener to get callbacks for user details update and refetch. Adding a listener more than once will not have any effect.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -addSessionRefreshListener:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Adds a listener to get callbacks for user session refresh activity. Adding a listener more than once will not have any effect.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -removeUserRegistrationListener:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Removes object from list of listeners once it does not need to be informed about user authentication activities. Removes an object that was not added will not have any effect.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -removeUserDetailsListener:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Removes object from list of listeners once it does not need to be informed about user details update and refetch. Removing an object that was not added will not have any effect.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -removeSessionRefreshListener:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Removes object from list of listeners once it does not need to be informed about user’s session refresh activities. Removing an object that was not added will not have any effect.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -logout
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: This method is called to logout currently logged in user. User will be logged out of both Janrain and HSDP (if config provided) backends. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserRegistrationDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -refreshLoginSession
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: This method is called to refresh session/tokens of currently logged in user. Both Janrain and HSDP sessions will be refreshed. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate SessionRefreshDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -updateReciveMarketingEmail:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Updates marketing opt-in of currently logged in user. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserDetailsDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -updateGender:withBirthday:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Updates gender and birthday of currently logged in user. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserDetailsDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -replaceConsumerInterest:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Replaces exisitng consumer interests list with new list. If you want to add or remove a consumer interest to this list, please create new list from existing list by adding or removing one or more consumer interests and replace old list with new one. Janrain SDK only supports replacing list as a way for update and hence the restiriction mentioned above. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserDetailsDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -getConsumerInterestForUser:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Gets list of consumer interests by the topicCommunicationKey for currently logged in user.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -refetchUserProfile
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Refetches logged in user’s latest profile from server. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserDetailsDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -checkIfJanrainFlowDownloadedWithCompletion:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: This method is called to check if PhilipsRegistration has downloaded all the URLs, configurations and flows needed to serve API calls. This call will automatically retry if last try to download the flow has failed. So, do not call it too many times if it returns failure.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -updateCountry:withCompletion:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: This method is called to change currently selected country for the user. This call would redownload all the URLs, configurations and flows specific to selected country.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -countryCodeWithCompletion:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: This method is called to get current country code from ServiceDiscovery. ServiceDiscovery with try to determine the country if not already done. This call would download all the URLs, configurations and flows specific to selected country if not already done.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -updateMobileNumber:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Updates user’s mobile number. Only available to China users. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserRegistrationDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -addRecoveryEmailToMobileNumberAccount:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Adds recovery email to user’s mobile number account. Only available to China users. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserDetailsDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.“

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -updateUserConsent:withCompletion:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Updates user’s COPPA consent to indicate if user has accepted or declined the (first) COPPA consent.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -updateUserConsentApproval:withCompletion:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Updates user’s COPPA consent approval to indicate if user has accepted or declined the (second) COPPA consent approval.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(cm.name: +application:openURL:options:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(cm.abstract: Handles openURL call from other applications. Used for handling native social login like WeChat or Google+ that are executed via SafaraiServices or native social apps. Call this method from AppDelegate of your application from method of similar signature.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -authorizeWithHSDPWithCompletion:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Handles hsdp login if the user is not loggedin to hsdp and have configured for skiphsdplogin to true

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -registerNewUserUsingTraditional:withMobileNumber:withFirstName:withLastName:withOlderThanAgeLimit:withReceiveMarketingMails:withPassword:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Registers a new user.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -resendVerificationMail:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Starts the flow to resend verification email to the user.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -forgotPasswordForEmail:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: This method is called when user has forgortten his password and wants to initiate process to reset it.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -resendVerificationCodeForMobile:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: This method is called when user has to verify his account using mobile and wants to initiate process to resend verification code.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -verificationCodeForMobile:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: This method is called when user has to verify his account using mobile and wants to initiate process to activate account.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -verificationCodeToResetPassword:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: This method is called when user has to reset his account using mobile and wants to initiate process to send verification code.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -loginUsingTraditionalWithEmail:password:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Registers the new user using traditional mechanism of email and password combination. Requires that the flow name and Capture app ID be configured.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -loginUsingProvider:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Registers a new user.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -completeSocialProviderLoginWithEmail:withMobileNumber:withOlderThanAgeLimit:withReceiveMarketingMails:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Completes the social provider login. It is called when user record was not found in the database and requires additional mandatory information to be registered.

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -handleMergeRegisterWithEmail:withPassword:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Handles Merging of users

Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.name: -handleMergeRegisterWithProvider:
Classes/DIUser.html#/c:objc(cs)DIUser(im.abstract: Handles Merging of users

Classes/DICOPPAExtension.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -getCoppaEmailConsentStatus
Classes/DICOPPAExtension.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Gets the consent status on Coppa email

Classes/DICOPPAExtension.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -fetchCoppaEmailConsentStatusWithCompletion:
Classes/DICOPPAExtension.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Fetches the latest COPPA consent status from server by fetching user profile.

Classes/DICOPPAExtension.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -getCoppaConsentLocale
Classes/DICOPPAExtension.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Returns locale used in consent displayed for your app.

Classes/DICOPPAExtension.html.name: DICOPPAExtension
Classes/DICOPPAExtension.html.abstract: This class defines methods that can be used by applications to query COPPA Consent status of logged in user.

Classes/DIUser.html.name: DIUser
Classes/DIUser.html.abstract: A wrapper class that provides all the User Identity and Authentication Management services for your application.

Classes/URConsentProvider.html.name: URConsentProvider
Classes/URConsentProvider.html.abstract: This class defines methods that can be used by applications to query marketing consent definition of user.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)URMarketingConse.name: URMarketingConsentHandler
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)URMarketingConse.abstract: This class conforms ConsentHandlerProtocol which helps applications to query or store marketing consents of user. ConsentHandlerProtocol has group of methods to fetch or store marketing consents.

Classes/DIConsumerInterest.html.name: DIConsumerInterest
Classes/DIConsumerInterest.html.abstract: This class defines attributes that represent a custom interest of consumers.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)URDependencies.name: URDependencies
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)URDependencies.abstract: A class that allows applications to inject dependencies to PhilipsRegistration during initialization. There isn’t any dependency specific to PhilipsRegistration.

Classes/URInterface.html.name: URInterface
Classes/URInterface.html.abstract: This class defines methods of UAPPProtocol to allow applications be able to initialize PhilipsRegistration and/or instantiate appropriate UIViewController and launch user authentication process.

Classes/URLaunchInput.html.name: URLaunchInput
Classes/URLaunchInput.html.abstract: This class defines properties that can be used by applications to inform the kind of flow and content they would like to display to users when PhilipsRegistration is launched.

Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..name: DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration
Classes/DIRegistrationFlowConfiguration..abstract: A class that lets application inform PhilipsRegistration which flow to launch.
